articles.description: ETH Futures Potential Launch, Spot Delayed According to ETF analyst Eric Balchunas, the SEC asked ETH futures ETF filers to update their docs for applications by Friday, so ETFs may go live next week. Meanwhile, the SEC has delayed reaching a decision to late December on
articles.title: Today in DeFi - ETH Futures Potential Launch, Yearn veYFI Soon, LPing with Options, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: HTX $8M Hack HTX was hacked and lost 5,000 ETH (~$8M). The loss has been covered and issues have been resolved according to HTX advisor Justin Sun. Dopex CLAMM Public Testing Deopx launches public testing for CLAMM. CLAMM is part of the Dopex V2 upgrade, using v3 AMM positions to help LPs earn additional premiums and give option buyers more flexibility.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - HTX 8M Hack, Dopex CLAMM Pubic Testing, Double Rewards LPing, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Linear â„“USD Exploit Linear Finance was exploited and the attackers drained all â„“USD liquidity on both PancakeSwap and Ascendex, resulting in the price of â„“USD going to zero. Linear contracts are paused and the team works with security firms to track the attackers.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Linear â„“USD Exploit , Intents Based Dex, Perp trading without liquidation!?, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: GammaSwap Live GammaSwap is live on Arbitrum mainnet. Gamma is a DEX on top of Uniswap v2, allowing users to trade volatility through AMMs (i.e. short LP tokens). Traders can use Gamma to speculate on volatility or as "insurance" for their spot holdings, and MMs can use Gamma to hedge their LP position.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - GammaSwap Live, Poolshark Limit Pools, Higher Savings Rate, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Balancer Frontend Attack Balancer frontend is under a DNS attack. Users are advised to not interact with the UI while the issue is under investigation. Approved: Gro to Unwind The Gro community voted to wind down the protocol and DAO due to the leadership vacuum and existential uncertainty.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Balancer Frontend Attack, RWA Partnership: Centrifuge x Aave, Diversified LST Yield, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: DeFi Saver Savings Protection DeFi Saver launches savings protection automation (Supply and Payback) for Liquity and Maker users. Approved: 50M ARB Short-term Incentive Program Arbitrum governance voted to distribute up to 50M ARB of DAO-funded incentives targeting active Arbitrum protocols.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - DeFi Saver Savings Protection, ARB Short-term Incentive Program, LST Farming, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Yearn yETH Live Yearn launches yETH, a yield-bearing token comprising five LSTs, including sfrxETH, swETH, wstETH, ETHx, and cbETH. Raft V2 Interest Rate Vaults Live LST-backed stablecoin protocol Raft launches V2 Interest Rate Vaults, allowing users to mint the R stablecoin with LSTs as collateral ( $wstETH, $rETH, $cbETH, $swETH, and $WETH). R now offers a 6%-8% APR.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn yETH Live, Raft V2 Interest Rate Vaults, Best Metamask Snaps, and More...

articles.description: opBNB Mainnet Live opBNB mainnet is now open to the public. opBNB is an EVM-compatible L2 built on the Optimism OP Stack. There are now over 150 projects building on opBnB. Comsos V12 Live Cosmos has completed the â€œGaia V12â€ upgrade. The upgrade introduces the liquid staking module (LSM), allowing for ATOM staked with validators to convert into liquid-staked ATOM.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - opBNB Mainnet Live, Cosmos V12 Live, Cross-chain Farming, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Thena Perps Live Thena launches perpetuals beta on the BnB Chain, allowing users to trade $BTC, $ETH, $BNB, and over 150 other assets with up to 60x leverage. Manta Mainnet Live Manta launches its Pacific alpha mainnet. Manta is a modular EVM L2 that enables easy integration of ZK features directly into EVM dApps.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Thena Perps Live, Manta Mainnet Live, One-Stop Leveraged Staking ,and More...

articles.description: Synapse Interchain Network & L2 Testnet The Synapse Interchain Network(SIN) and the Synapse Chain testnet are live. The SIN is the first PoS bridge and the Synapse Chain serves as the interchain data availability layer for SIN. Swaps Across Cosmos and EVMs
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Synapse Interchain Network & L2 Testnet, Swaps Across Cosmos and EVMs, Trading NFTs on Solana, and More...

articles.description: CFTC Issues Orders Against DeFi Protocols, CFTC issued orders against three DeFi protocols for offering digital asset derivatives trading. The orders request "that Opyn, ZeroEx, and Deridex pay civil monetary penalties of $250,000, $200,000, and $100,000, respectively, and cease and desist from violating the Commodity Exchange Act (CEA) and
articles.title: Today in DeFi - CFTC Issues Orders Against DeFi Protocols, Aevo Trading Credit, High-Yield Leveraged Farming, and More...

articles.description: Avalanche Multiswap Live Multiswap, a multi-asset swap AMM created by CavalRe, is live on Avalanche. Multiswap allows users to concentrate liquidity and swap multiple tokens in a single transaction, with a UX made easy for traders and LPs. Wombat Alpha Cross-chain Pool Live
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Avalanche Multiswap Live, Wombat Alpha Cross-chain Pool, Test out Innovative Options, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: One-tx Leveraged Staking DeFiSaver just released ETH Saver, a new website with one-tx leveraged eth staking, making it easy for users to participate in these strategies. ETHSaver is non custodial and users can choose the lending protocol and LSD they like.
articles.title: Leveraged Staking in one Tx, FloorDAO Rebase Exploit, Switch Debt on Aave, and more

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Raft V2 Live LST-backed stablecoin project Raft launches V2, introducing the 6% R Saving Rate and PSM. Liquis Live Liquis, a liquid governance wrapper for Bunni Pro (liquidity management for Uni V3), is live. Liquis allows users to stake range tokens to earn boosted emissions on Bunni.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Raft V2 Live, Liquis Live, LPing for Airdrop, and More...
